title: Elder coordinates neighborhood elder check-in system
description: Elder coordinates neighborhood elder check-in system
content:
Scenario: Elder coordinates neighborhood elder check-in system
    Given several elders in the neighborhood live alone
    And Rose wants to ensure everyone has daily connection
    When Rose proposes a daily elder check-in system
    And volunteers agree to participate in rotation
    Then the coordination agent helps organize the schedule
    And each elder receives daily contact from neighbors
    And any concerns are immediately surfaced to family and community
    And Rose experiences agency in building community care
    And isolation is prevented through systematic connection
